UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Multipurpose peptides: The venoms of Amazonian stinging ants contain anthelmintic ponericins with diverse predatory and defensive activities.
Literature.Author: Nixon SA, Robinson SD, Agwa AJ, Walker AA, Choudhary S, Touchard A, Undheim EAB, Robertson A, Vetter I, Schroeder CI, Kotze AC, Herzig V, King GF

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=28.6-48.2 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=12.6-13.5 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25.8-51.6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>40µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=12.91µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>40µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=2.9-5.9µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=1.48-5.9µM),Haemonchus contortus(IC50=5.1±0.9µM),Lucilia cuprina(LD50=32.6±11.3nmol/g)
